snippet: The media company said it benefited by selling video advertising on the web globally, with 23 percent growth in that revenue.
abstract: AOL reports fourth-quarter net income of $92 million, down 92 percent from just over $1 billion in year-earlier period, amid costs related to struggling news service Patch; notes total revenue grew by 13 percent to $679 million, fueled by robust growth in advertising.
lead_paragraph: The media company said it benefited by selling video advertising on the web globally, with 23 percent growth in that revenue.

headline.main: AOL Reports Solid Revenue, but Patch Weighs on Profit
headline.print_headline: AOL Reports Solid Revenue, but Patch Weighs on Profit
